text: João Pedro Pinto Cardoso (born 10 February 1997) is a Portuguese footballer who plays as a midfielder for G.D. Estoril Praia in LigaPro. ==References== ==External links== * *National team data Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Portuguese footballers Category:FC Porto B players Category:G.D. title: João Cardoso (footballer, born 1997)
